Title: Putrid Blightkings
Legend: Putrid Blightkings carve their way forwards with slime-encrusted blades, hammers and axes. Their bloated, rotting bodies can absorb tremendous punishment, allowing them to drive relentlessly through the foe’s battleline.
Intro: Each model in a Putrid Blightkings unit is armed with a Blighted Weapon.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Blight Cyst • Plague Cyst

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Blightlord. That model has a Wounds characteristic of 5.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be an Icon Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit while it includes any Icon Bearers.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Sonorous Tocsin Bearer. Re-roll battleshock rolls of 1 for enemy units that are within 6" of any friendly Sonorous Tocsin Bearers.

Rules.Name: Relentless Attackers
Rules.Fluff: Blightkings grind through the battlelines of lesser foes, shattering their morale and hacking down the stunned survivors with contemptuous ease.
Rules.Rule: At the end of the combat phase, pick 1 enemy unit with a Wounds characteristic of 3 or less that is within 3" of this unit. Roll 1 dice for each model in this unit that is within 3" of that enemy unit. For each roll that exceeds that enemy unit’s Wounds characteristic, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
